thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com
thread.title: Jimmie Morrison

author: Jimmie Morrison
title: Jimmie Morrison
text: I got a Quote: online, walked into Drive Time in Kissimmee and was greeted by a wonderful staff. They made the ENTIRE experience of buying a car easier than ever! Felix D. made sure I was happy with everything, answered all questions professionally and with a sincere smile on his face. They ARE NOT car salesman they are ROCK STARS! I strongly recommend Drive Time to everyone looking to get into a vehicle. You will walk in a customer but walk out feeling like family. P.S. My son really loves the popcorn machine . I'd give more than 5 stars if I could.
